name: VNRectangleObservation
desc: An object that represents the four vertices of a detected rectangle.

items.name: init(requestRevision: Int, topLeft: CGPoint, bottomLeft: CGPoint, bottomRight: CGPoint, topRight: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates a rectangle observation from its corner points.

items.name: var bottomLeft: CGPoint
items.desc: The coordinates of the lower-left corner of the observation bounding box.

items.name: var bottomRight: CGPoint
items.desc: The coordinates of the lower-right corner of the observation bounding box.

items.name: var topLeft: CGPoint
items.desc: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the observation bounding box.

items.name: var topRight: CGPoint
items.desc: The coordinates of the upper-right corner of the observation bounding box.
